import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { logoutAction } from "../../../container/actions"; import Logout from "../../imports/Logout"; const AddClient = ({ posts }) => { const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const route = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem("x-access-token"); return token ? true : false; }; useEffect(() => { if (!route()) { history.push("/login"); } }, [route, history]); const logout = () => { dispatch(logoutAction()); }; const [nama, setNama] = useState(""); const [telepon, setTelepon] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [filename, setFileName] = useState(""); const onChangeFile = (e) => { setFileName(e.target.files[0]); }; const changeOnClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("nama", nama); formData.append("telepon", telepon); formData.append("email", email); formData.append("gambar", filename); axios .post("http://localhost:4000/api/clients/add", formData) .then((res) => alert(res.data), history.push("/clients")) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
